docTitle.titlePart:
Redetermination of the crystal structure of tetralithium mononitride
monohydride, Li 4 NH

byline.docAuthor: R. Niewa* and D. A. Zherebtsov

byline.affiliation: Max-Planck-Institut für Chemische Physik fester Stoffe,

front.div:
Source of material
Li 4 NH was obtained from reaction of LiNH 2 and Li 3 N in liquid Li
in the presence of Fe at 1020 K. Light yellow single crystals grow
on slow cooling to 300 K within 20 h. Excess Li was removed by
washing with liquid ammonia below 240 K.
